title: WTF IS THE LAG RIOT
body: SO EVERYTIME I PLAY LEAGUE FIRST FEW MINUTES ARE FINE BUT THEN SOON I GET LIKE 2000 PING AND EVERYTHING FREEZES. OTHER TIMES I CAN MOVE WITH MY CURSOR BUT WHEN I SPECTATE I DONT SEE THE ABILITY A ANIMATIONS ON CHAMPIONS AND MY PING IS 40 IT NEVER UNFREEZES AND THIS DOESNT HAPPEN TO ANY OF MY OTHER GAMES.... FIX THIS

replies.body: It sounds like those lag spikes might be happening due to how your connection is being sent to our servers. I want to check out how that connection looked really quickly by using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan some of those network logs from a game that had those crazy ping spikes. Take a screenshot, and post it here so I can go over it with you!

That 4000 ping and packet loss are most likely happening due to the way your ISP is routing your connection. Packet loss can be rather detrimental to online games when it happens, so I'd consider reaching out to that ISP to see if there are any current issues. After that, you've always been welcome to shoot our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where you'll get much more in-depth troubleshooting steps.
